title: How to deploy WildFly Bootable JAR on OpenShift
content: In this updated article we will learn how to deploy an application built with WildFly Bootable JAR Maven on OpenShift using JKube Maven plugin. We will show how to add the plugin configuration to your Maven project and how to run and test the application on OpenShift. JKube Maven Plugin in a Nutshell Eclipse JKube ...  The post appeared first on .
